task.title: Javier take a shower you stink
task.shortdesc: Javier needs to appreciate hygeine. Showering will help him feel better and more enjoyable to be around.

taskbody.context: Hokies need to smell good as to not disturb other students in class with your stink.

step.cmd: Go to the bathroom, grab a towel from under the sink and turn on the water.
Grab the soap, (don't drop it) and lather it up on your body.
Wash your hair with the shampoo and and use the washcloth to wash your face.
Turn water off, and get out of the shower to dry off.
Clean your ears and brush your teeth and you're ready for the day!
